downloadTitle: Windows Thin PC Quick Start Guide 1.0
downloadDescription: Thin PC new features and installation basics.

downloadFile.name: Windows Thin PC Quick Start Guide v1 0.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/2/b/0/2b04e384-6dd5-4194-8d87-3fc21f354cec/Windows Thin PC Quick Start Guide v1 0.pdf

detailsSection:
In this Quick Start, you will learn about a few of the new features
available in Windows Thin PC as well as the basics of installation.
On completion, you will have a full installation of Windows Thin PC.
We encourage you to then install your Thin PC solution as well as
your management and monitoring solutions to verify that they all
perform as expected, equivalent to their operation on Windows 7
Professional, Enterprise or Ultimate.
detailsSection_file_name: Windows Thin PC Quick Start Guide v1 0.pdf
